MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 30-NOV-2020 15:30.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: This is a message for customers in the EH12 postcode area of Edinburgh. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 11.57am to make emergency repairs to faulty electrical equipment in the communal area of 62 Palmerston Place and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12.31pm on the 30th of November 2020.
